SYSTEM: 2.RDF%28S%29.pdf: Página 15
• 15 
Types of URIs 
 
•  Thing-URIs, Hash URIs or URIRefs (Unique 
Resource Identifiers References) 
• 
A URI and an optional Fragment Identifier separated from the URI by the 
hash symbol ‘#’ 
• 
http://www.ontology.org/people#Person 
• 
people:Person 
•  Source URIs or Slash URIs can also be used, as in 
FOAF: 
• 
http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person 
Correspondence between thing-URI and source-URI
